description:
Learn European Portuguese from the beginning with a hands-on approach.

Get immersed in the language and be able to speak from day one and communicate in essential everyday life situations, starting with the first contacts.

How you will learn

  • You will learn through a highly visual course.
  • You will start by being presented with simple structures and vocabulary that build up, step-by-step, into more complex structures that you can use.
  • You will repeat each structure oraly, so that you get confortable with the accent and the structure itself.
  • You will see and hear simple dialogues, understanding when and how to take place in one.
  • You will be given the oportunity to take place in these dialogues, actively speaking.
  • You will solve listening exercises that improve your understanding.
  • You will take quizzes that help you consolidate what you have learned.

Contents

  • First contacts (formal and informal):
  • Introducing yourself.
  • Identifying and introducing someone else.
  • Asking closed questions (yes/no answer), and answering them.
  • Asking open questions and answering them.
  • Asking how someone is and answering.
  • Saying goobye in different situations (according to the time of day, day of the week, etc.).
  • Numbers from 0 to 20.
  • Survival Manual (everything you need to get around):
  • Identifying objects.
  • Grammar and phonetics.

What is included in this course

  • 20 lectures.
  • All materials you will need to succeed in learning the language during the course and also practicing by yourself after you finish it.
  • Printable PDFs with structured vocabulary and grammar that you can use as reference.
  • Printable PDFs with extra exercises to keep practicing (key included).
  • Audio exercises to practice listening and comprehension (key included).
  • Tutor available for follow up questions.

How it is structured

  • Each topic has its own lecture, with speaking practice, listening practice, quizz and additional material to further practice and use as reference.

Why take this course

  • Speak from the beginning.
  • Learn in a simple, clear and easy to understand way (step-by-step).
  • Learn in a practical and interactive way that will help you get confortable and speaking with confidence.
  • Learn with a highly visual course that helps you with memorization.
  • Have fun!
title: Start speaking Portuguese today - First contacts
